formulas.t-blog-index: BlogIndex = Hero(o-hero) + FeaturedPost + CategoryTabs(m-tabs) + PostGrid(Card(m-card)) + Pagination(m-pagination) + NewsletterCTA
formulas.t-blog-post-page: BlogPostPage = BlogPost(o-blog-post) + AuthorCard(AvatarGroup(m-avatar-group)) + ShareButtons(m-share-button) + TableOfContents + Comments(o-comments-section) + RelatedPosts
formulas.t-checkout-page: CheckoutPage = CheckoutForm(o-checkout-form) + CheckoutSummary(o-checkout-summary) + Stepper(m-stepper) + AddressInput(m-address-input) + CreditCardInput(m-credit-card-input)
formulas.t-landing-page: LandingPage = Hero(o-hero) + Features(o-features) + Testimonials(o-testimonials) + Pricing(o-pricing) + CTA(o-cta) + FAQ(o-faq)
formulas.t-product-detail: ProductDetail = ProductCard(o-product-card) + MediaGallery(o-media-gallery) + ReviewForm(o-review-form) + Rating(m-rating) + DisplayCurrency(a-display-currency)
